formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu diesem AMI-Befehl in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen: Action: AgentLogoff Synopsis: Sets an agent as no longer logged in Privilege: agent,all Description: Sets an agent as no longer logged in. Variables: (Names marked with * are required) *Agent: Agent ID of the agent to log off Soft: Set to 'true' to not hangup existing calls
